overview: For more than 70 years, Bahamian musician Nathaniel Saunders embodied the character and spirit of the Bimini islands through his timeless songs, ebullient personality and irresistible folk tales. Once a tour guide for writer Ernest Hemingway, Saunders is a Bahamian national treasure. This compilation features many of the then 89-year-old musician's most beloved tunes, including "Percy Francis," "Wasp Bite Obie" and "Bahama Melody."
title: Nathaniel Saunders: Bimini Nights
